Forty-Seven

Apr 17, 2018

Today is your birthday!
Don’t let that dismay
You’re not a year older
It’s only a day

An age is a digit
Time there to bridge it
The space in between like
A Memory widget

So just think of today
Like an act in a play
It’s one long production
But what I can I say?

© 2021 Michael Halstead
